title: Societies Act 1893 for a certain period and such other period (if any) as may be
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial and Provident Societies Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial and Provident Societies Act 

1893 (Section 14A(1)) (Covid-19) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited industrial provident society act 1893 (section 14a(1)) (covid-19) order 2021

title: Societies Act 1893 for a certain period and such other period (if any) as may be
heading: In this Order “Act of 2020” means the Companies (Miscellaneous
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order “Act of 2020” means the Companies (Miscellaneous 

Provisions) (Covid-19) Act 2020 (No. 9 of 2020).
text_norm: 2 order act 2020 mean company (miscellaneous provisions) (covid-19) act 2020 (no 9 2020)

title: Societies Act 1893 for a certain period and such other period (if any) as may be
heading: 3. The period beginning on 10 June 2021 and ending on 31 December 2021
text_raw:
3. The period beginning on 10 June 2021 and ending on 31 December 2021 
is hereby specified as the period to which the interim period, as defined in section 
79 (amended by section 29 of the Act of 2020) of the Industrial and Provident 
Societies Act 1893 (56 & 57 Vict., c.39) shall be extended in respect of the 
amendments effected by Part 3 of the Act of 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

18 May, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
